translations: adj.奋斗的，富有进取心的；莽撞的
v.推，推动；按下（按钮、开关等）；鼓励，逼迫（push 的现在分词）

phrs.translation: 推料机；推钢机；送料装置

sentences.sentence: The kids were pushing the roundabout at a giddy speed.
sentences.translation: 孩子们推动着旋转平台快得令人眩晕。

sentences.sentence: Pushing 40, he was an aging rock star.
sentences.translation: 快40岁的他是个慢慢老去的摇滚明星。

sentences.sentence: He walked slowly up the hill pushing his bike.
sentences.translation: 他推着自行车缓缓爬上山。
